description: AVENIRPROJ files can be exported to several file formats, including .DOCX , .DOC , .HTML , .PDF , .RTF , .RTFD , and .WEBARCHIVE .
Mariner Software changed the AVENIRPROJ file extension to .STORYMILL in StoryMill version 3.0.2. Both file extensions can be used interchangeably with the software.
NOTE: Mariner Software discontinued the development of StoryMill.
